sentences.sentence: Dentists fill teeth and repair broken ones.
Dentists advise you to have your teeth checked every six months.
sentences.translation: 牙医建议大家每六个月检查一次牙齿。

sentences.sentence: For months dentists and the health department have been at loggerheads over fees.
sentences.translation: 牙医们与卫生部之间数月以来在费用问题上发生了争执。
